title: Effective Feedback Design and Utilization Strategies for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental teaching experience as an educator and feedback concept comprehension
context.additional_context: A practice-centered program enabling pre-service teachers to effectively design and utilize feedback in diverse educational contexts. Providing content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to select appropriate feedback types (written/oral/visual) based on situational needs.
In project-based assessments, learners will analyze feedback and apply it to improvement plans.
In 1:1 teacher-student feedback sessions, learners will execute effective communication strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
